p:
Locations such as Africa and the Americas are considered areas of YFV epidemic threat, due to their historical epidemic records even within the US
31 . Tretyakova et al .
31 mentioned that the World Health Organization (WHO) has estimated that every year, 200,000 new cases of YF and 30,000 deaths will occur worldwide, even though the YF current geographic distribution includes mainly African and South American tropical areas.
